page.title: 07LEISURE IN BICESTER.
page.content: RECREATION:The town has an excellent sports centre which was built in 1970. It has a heated swimming pool with a spectator gallery which also has a bar and refreshment area.There are squash courts and a large hall used for net- ball,badminton and gymnastics.There are facilities for table tennis and saunas.The town has a very active swimming club with young children in- volved in galas around the country. There is a Snooker club in Chapel Street.It has 9 tables,a restaurant and a bar. The Gliding Club is held at the old R.A.F.station nearby.Membership is open to all Service personnel with 5% being allocated to civilians.There are 3 run- ways with plane-tow and winch tow.Some motorised gliders are also in use here.
